question: In the analysis of III group basic radicals of salts, the purpose of adding <katex>$NH_{4}Cl_{(s)}$</katex> to <katex>$NH_{4}OH$</katex> is:
choices: To increase the concentration of OH ions.
To precipitate the radicals of group IV and V.
explanation: Common ion effect suppresses OH- concentration to only precipitate Group III hydroxides.
